snippet: The number of Democrats and Republicans on the list was about even, with a median net worth of $1,008,767 for 2012, according to the analysis.
abstract: Financial disclosure reports find that for first time in history more than half of members of House and Senate are millionaires, at least 268 of 534; number of Democrats and Republicans on list is about even, with median net worth of $1,008,767 for 2012.
lead_paragraph: The number of Democrats and Republicans on the list was about even, with a median net worth of $1,008,767 for 2012, according to the analysis.

headline.main: Half of Congress Members Are Millionaires, Report Says
headline.print_headline: Half of Congress Members Are Millionaires, Report Says
